channel.title: Help me making a special attack working

item.title: Help me making a special attack working
item.dc:creator: @nobiwa666 nobiwa666
item.description:
@nobiwa666 wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15351 && specialAmount <= 49) {//sarazword
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage(“You do not have enough special energy left.”);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15351 && specialAmount >= 49) {//sarazword
startAnimation(1499);
stillgfx(245, absY, absX);
stillgfx(365, absY, absX);
stillgfx(366, absY, absX);
stillgfx(369, absY, absX);
stillgfx(396, absY, absX);
stillgfx(1, absY, absX);
stillgfx(442, absY, absX);
stillgfx(550, absY, absX);
specialDamage = 190 + misc.random(700);
specialAmount -= 100;
}
that is what i added but the spicial isnt working

Read full topic
